overview: Peter Donker completed his PhD in 1999 at the University of Technology in Delft (The Netherlands) entitled â€œSCAFFOLD: Structuring Communication in the Architectural Forum for Online Designâ€ which examined the communication process during the design process and proposed ways to improve this using IT. After Delft he left for Enschede where he worked for three years at the Telematica Instituut (www.telin.nl) to continue research in ICT and human collaboration. His focus was knowledge management. For personal reasons, in 2002 he left for Switzerland. In late 2003 he ran into DotNetNuke while working on an intranet project. Realizing its potential, he started his own company, Bring2mind (http://www.bring2mind.net), which specializes in document management on the DNN framework.
